special_text:
[i]“It’s time, Sirif. Today your debts will be settled, whether in gold or in blood.”[/i]
Create a 2/2 red Cat creature token with first strike.
Paint the Town Red deals 4 damage to target opponent unless that player has you draw two cards.
Exile this enchantment, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
rules_text2:
First strike
Whenever Sirif attacks, they deal 4 damage to defending player unless that player has you create a 2/2 red and white Cat creature token with first strike that’s tapped and attacking that player.
When Sirif dies, return this card to its owner’s hand.
